did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.origination:
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR);
Jacobstein, Richard
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Memorabila from Richard Jacobstein, ILR Class of 1956.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Richard Jacobstein graduated from the ILR School in 1956. He served as ILR Student Council President in 1955-1956.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of ILR School Class of 1956 memorabilia and biographical information about Richard Jacobstein.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations. Alumni Association

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: ILR School Richard Jacobstein Memorabilia #/4119m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:
Related Collections:
/4078: ILR School 40th Anniversary Documents
/4118 MB: ILR School Alumni Memorabilia
/4120: ILR School Alumni Scrapbooks

scopecontent.p: Includes program for ILR Senior Banquet, 1956; Last Will and Testament of the Class of 1956; newspaper clipping about Richard Jacobstein, 1955; biographical information about Jacobstein for ILR Reunion scrapbook, 1991.
